articles.title: European markets head for higher open as the region's banks are watched closely - CNBC
articles.description: European markets are heading for a higher open at the start of the new trading week, with the region's banks under scrutiny.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cryptocurrencies add nothing useful to society, says chip-maker Nvidia - The Guardian
articles.description: Tech chief says the development of chatbots is a more worthwhile use of processing power than crypto mining
articles.content:

articles.title: Billionaire Chris Rokos De-Risks Hedge Fund After Losses - Bloomberg
